item.title: Averting the Tragedy of the Commons: Critical Feedbacks across Scales from Microbes to Humans symposium has been accepted for the 2018 Ecological Society of America Conference held in New Orleans!
Our joint symposium entitled Evolutionary Epidemiology across multiple scales has been accepted for the 2018 Evolution Conference held in Montepellier, France!
Example Talk
item.description: Embed your slides or video here using shortcodes. Further details can easily be added using Markdown and $\rm \LaTeX$ math code.
